description: Spiced potatoes, cauliflower and spinach work perfectly together in this easy aloo gobi, ideal as a side dish for an Indian feast.
name: Potatoes Aloo Gobi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes
1 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped, stalks included

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Boil the potatoes in a pot of water for 6-7 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and add the cauliflower. Cook for 3 minutes and drain well. Toss the potatoes and cauliflower in a bowl with a little oil.

Spread the potatoes and cauliflower on a baking sheet and roast for 12 minutes. Heat the oil and cook the onions for 10 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 2 minutes, stir in the spices and coriander stalks and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the cauliflower and potatoes to the pan and stir to coat, adding a little water if necessary. Add the spinach and cook for 2 minutes, until wilted.
Serve with the rest of the coriander on top and lime wedges on the side.
